name: Horror VR Game: Scary VR Zombie FPS Shooter 360
name_original: Horror VR Game: Scary VR Zombie FPS Shooter 360
description:
Be the first to take part in the scariest VR experience one can imagine. In this real game where You explore dark places of horror forest full of Zombies that arose from their graves as the apocalypse day has come.

Let's see how long You will survive. Take advantage of finding more weapons hidden in mysterious places like mental hospital or rotten lake.


Game Features :
* Scary horror environment that will make you shiver.
* 5 different weapons hidden on the map.
* Highly optimized for purpose of great VR experience.

Play on your favourite VR headset. No Controller needed.

-------------------
Health Warning:
When using application remain stationary and stop using, when you experience discomfort or health reaction.
Ensure you read this document:
http://wenklystudio.com/legal/Warnings/VrHealthWarning.pdf before first use.
